mapper.sql: id, name, uid, title, content, ctime, mtime, task_id, sub_task_id
mapper.select: SELECT j.id jsonId, j.`name` jsonName, u.username userName, j.content json FROM t_json_info j LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = j.uid WHERE j.task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT s.source_id sourceId, s.source_db sourceDb, s.source_tbl sourceTbl, s.target_id targetId, s.target_db targetDb, s.target_tbl targetTbl, s.id subTaskId, j.id jsonId, j.content jsonContent, s.collect_type collectType FROM t_sub_task_info s LEFT JOIN t_json_info j ON s.id = j.sub_task_id WHERE s.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.source_db = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.source_tbl = #{tblName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
